title: KUMAR MAGNA CITY
detail: Kumar Magna City combines modern elegance with practical living in its 2 and 3 BHK residences. These thoughtfully designed homes offer spacious layouts and contemporary finishes, perfect for comfortable living. Enjoy premium features such as high-quality flooring, stylish fixtures, and well-planned interiors that maximize space and functionality. Kumar Magna City’s focus on quality construction and attention to detail ensures a refined living experience. Embrace a lifestyle of sophistication and convenience in this exceptional residential community.
developer_detail: Kumar World, with over 55 years of experience, has consistently set high standards in real estate and other industries. We're proud that even during challenging times, we've maintained our reputation as a forward-thinking brand with thriving companies across various sectors.
city_description: Experience the best of both worlds in Manjari Budruk, a burgeoning suburb in Pune's east. Enjoy seamless connectivity to major IT hubs, educational institutions, and lifestyle destinations. Discover a thriving community with modern amenities, lush green spaces, and a well-planned infrastructure. Your dream home awaits in this vibrant and rapidly developing locale.
